channel.title: The Oracle [BD Investigative] / The Prophet [Unseen Investigative]
channel.description:
> # [color=blue]The Oracle[/color] >*[color=blue]Blue Dragon Investigative[/color]* > > **Passive (Third Eye)** - Anytime you visit a player at night, you will be notified if something is off about them. The following things are what may trigger the "something is off about ____" notification: They are bleeding, reaped that night, have a sorc bomb on them, framed that night, possessed that night, jumped into that night by possessor, occupied that night, or redirected that night. > > **Night Ability (Detect)** - Choose a player. You will be told if they have any passives or not. *Infinite Uses*. > > **Night Ability (Magic Window)** - Choose a player. If they have no passives, you will be told. If they have two passives, you will be told. If they have only one passive you will be told what kind of passive it is out of the following options: Bleed immune, Death immune, Occupation/Redirection Immune, Royal Blood, or Other. *2 uses.* > > *Goal: Defeat all those that seek to do the BD harm.*
> # [color=purple]The Prophet[/color] > *[color=purple]Unseen Investigative[/color]* > > **Passive (Fourth Eye)** - Anytime you visit a player at night, you will be notified if and what is off about them, out of the following options: They are bleeding, reaped that night, have a sorc bomb on them, framed that night, possessed that night, jumped into that night by possessor, occupied that night, or redirected that night. > > **Night Ability (Soul Disable)** - Select a player. All of their passives will be disabled tonight and tomorrow day. You can only disable a passive if it doesn't break the character, so classes like prince and pretender cannot be disabled. *3 uses.* > > **Night Ability (Cursed Mirror)** - Select a player. You will know how many passives they have and what type of passives they are out of the following types: Bleed immune, Death immune, Occupation/Redirection Immune, Royal Blood, or Other. *3 uses.* > > *Goal: Defeat the BD and all players that seek to do you harm.*
Suggestions and comments are appreciated!

item.title: The Oracle [BD Investigative] / The Prophet [Unseen Investigative]
item.dc:creator: TheVideoChipmunk
item.description:
Chrono, Cw, Sheriff, Maid, some of the most commonly fake claimed classes don’t have passives, while the classes who would be claiming them would. That’s why I think oracle would be good, but not OP, with the simple ability to know passives which would cause you to do more baiting/scum reading than a hard-counter investigator like sheriff.

Read full topic
item.source: The Oracle [BD Investigative] / The Prophet [Unseen Investigative]

item.title: The Oracle [BD Investigative] / The Prophet [Unseen Investigative]
item.dc:creator: TheVideoChipmunk
item.description:
You’d be surprised how many classes don’t. Pretty much every Investigative class doesn’t have passives, which is the most fake claimed class type

Read full topic

item.title: The Oracle [BD Investigative] / The Prophet [Unseen Investigative]
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
TheVideoChipmunk:

Night Ability (Detect) - Choose a player. You will be told if they have any passives or not. Infinite Uses .

Doesn’t practically all classes have passives?

Read full topic
item.source: The Oracle [BD Investigative] / The Prophet [Unseen Investigative]

item.title: The Oracle [BD Investigative] / The Prophet [Unseen Investigative]
item.dc:creator: TheVideoChipmunk
item.description:
Check the passive. It’ll say, for Oracle, “something is off about ____” if the target qualifies for any of those listed things. He will not know what it is, but he knows it’s gonna be one of those. While the prophet will know something is off about them, except, unlike the oracle, he will know what it is that is off about them. He will know if they were reaped, possessed, occd, etc, while the Oracle wont.

Read full topic
item.source: The Oracle [BD Investigative] / The Prophet [Unseen Investigative]

item.title: The Oracle [BD Investigative] / The Prophet [Unseen Investigative]

item.description:
got you @TheVideoChipmunk but what does that mean?

Read full topic
item.source: The Oracle [BD Investigative] / The Prophet [Unseen Investigative]

item.title: The Oracle [BD Investigative] / The Prophet [Unseen Investigative]
item.dc:creator: TheVideoChipmunk
item.description:
It’s not;
Oracle will see that “something is off about ____”
While the prophet will see exactly what is off about them

Read full topic

item.source: The Oracle [BD Investigative] / The Prophet [Unseen Investigative]

item.title: The Oracle [BD Investigative] / The Prophet [Unseen Investigative]
item.dc:creator: TheVideoChipmunk
item.description:
The Oracle

Blue Dragon Investigative

Passive (Third Eye) - Anytime you visit a player at night, you will be notified if something is off about them. The following things are what may trigger the “something is off about ____” notification: They are bleeding, reaped that night, have a sorc bomb on them, framed that night, possessed that night, jumped into that night by possessor, occupied that night, or redirected that night.

Night Ability (Detect) - Choose a player. You will be told if they have any passives or not. Infinite Uses.

Night Ability (Magic Window) - Choose a player. If they have no passives, you will be told. If they have two passives, you will be told. If they have only one passive you will be told what kind of passive it is out of the following options: Bleed immune, Death immune, Occupation/Redirection Immune, Royal Blood, or Other. 2 uses.

Goal: Defeat all those that seek to do the BD harm.

The Prophet

Unseen Investigative

Passive (Fourth Eye) - Anytime you visit a player at night, you will be notified if and what is off about them, out of the following options: They are bleeding, reaped that night, have a sorc bomb on them, framed that night, possessed that night, jumped into that night by possessor, occupied that night, or redirected that night.

Night Ability (Soul Disable) - Select a player. All of their passives will be disabled tonight and tomorrow day. You can only disable a passive if it doesn’t break the character, so classes like prince and pretender cannot be disabled. 3 uses.

Night Ability (Cursed Mirror) - Select a player. You will know how many passives they have and what type of passives they are out of the following types: Bleed immune, Death immune, Occupation/Redirection Immune, Royal Blood, or Other. 3 uses.

Goal: Defeat the BD and all players that seek to do you harm.

Suggestions and comments are appreciated!

Read full topic
item.source: The Oracle [BD Investigative] / The Prophet [Unseen Investigative]
